Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Actuator rod end play exceeding tolerance. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Cargo Handling component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 11/06/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon
